topic.question: 1. I will allow my son to go to town. What will I do?
2. Where do you take your dirty clothes?
3. Tom got on the wrong bus yesterday. Jim did, too.
option: Tom missed the wrong bus yesterday.
Both Jim and Tom rode the wrong bus.
Jim didn't get on the wrong bus yesterday.

topic.question: 4. Jones thinks English is a difficult language.
option: He thinks it is hard to learn.
He thinks it is a dead language.

topic.question: 5. Mr. Richards employs a lot of people.
option: A lot of people work for Mr. Richards.
A lot of people live with Mr. Richards.
A lot of people agree with Mr. Richards.
A lot of people listen to Mr. Richards.

topic.question: 6. The weatherman says it will freeze tonight. What does he mean?
7. Joe is at the store. He wants to go back to his room. It's necessary for him to walk 12 blocks. How far is it from the store to Joe's room?
8. John has a lot of new ideas. What has he been doing?
9. Tom said, "This shirt cost ten ninety-eight." What was Tom talking about?
10. Which of these is a machine?
11. Jackson cooks all our meals for us. What does he do?
12. Jim mailed the letter to his wife yesterday after class. What did Jim do yesterday?
option: went home to see his wife

topic.question: 13. Rebecca wanted cash for her car when she sold it. What did she want?
14. Sixty students attended church services last Sunday. How many were at the service?
15. This house has lots of storage space. What does this house have?
16. John ate some dessert at noon. What did he eat?
17. The nurse knew how tall he was. What did she know about him?
18. If it rains, the students may not go to the drive-in movie.
option: If it rains, the students will go to the drive-in.
It is certain that they will go to the drive-in.
If they go, it is sure to rain.
It is not certain that they will go.

topic.question: 19. The bank is opposite the post office.
option: The bank is on a different street.
The bank is across the street from the post office.
The bank is just behind the post office.
The bank is next to the post office.

topic.question: 20. That street is very straight.
21. The drugstore is near the shoe shop.
option: It is inside the shoe shop.
It is above the shoe shop.
It is far from the shoe shop.
It is close to the show shop.

topic.question: 22. Hilda returned home at fifteen twenty-five hours. When did she return?
23. The rock crashed through the window.
option: It went through an open window.
It did not go through the window.
It hit and broke the window.

topic.question: 24. I see a big storm approaching.
25. The wind did not damage the wheat.
option: The wind blew down the wheat.
The wind did not hurt the wheat.
The wind did not hurt the wheat.
The wind turned the wheat yellow.

topic.question: 26. They kept their people in mind.
27. Mr. Smith has to go to the bank today.
28. This box is easy to lift because it is so light.
29. Will you get through your homework soon?
option: Yes, I think I'll start it soon.
Yes, it'll take some time to do.
Yes, I need to go through it.

topic.question: 30. Aren't those two students alike?
option: Yes, I need to go through it.

topic.question: 31. The book has many chapters. What is a chapter?
32. Where did you put my pencil this morning?
option: I go it from Miss Bell.
I laid it on the bookcase.
I bought it at the bookstore.

topic.question: 33. There was an abrupt change in the weather. What kind of change was it?
34. He's going to take up medicine this year. What is he going to do?
option: He's going to continue working as a doctor.
He's going to see the doctor.

topic.question: 35. Mr. Jones tried the car out on the highway. What did he do?
36. The meat was too rare.
37. The children cooked their supper tonight. I didn't help them.
option: Supper was prepared by my wife.
My wife and I prepared the supper.
The children can't cook at all.
The children did all the work.

topic.question: 38. There were 25 students in all who made a trip to the zoo.
option: Altogether, there were 25 students on the trip.
There were 25 trips made to the zoo.
The students all were 25 years old.
There were 25 students who called the zoo.

topic.question: 39. James is an efficient worker.
option: He does his work quickly and well.

topic.question: 40. The cadet was not guilty of the charge.
option: The cadet was given a fine.
The cadet was sentenced to prison.

topic.question: 41. Bob Moore wanted to inspect the oxygen mask.
option: He wanted to look at it.

topic.question: 42. Mike spread out the maps.
43. The air is dense at the sea level.
44. We had to stand up in the bus on the trip to town.
option: The bus was on the wrong street.
We had to wait for the bus to town.
We had to stand at the bus stop.
All seats on the bus were taken.

topic.question: 45. Mr. Long liked the cartoons in the evening newspaper. What were they?
46. Annette says she got a new filling yesterday. What did she get?
option: a cavity filled by the dentist

topic.question: 47. How did the hole get there?
48. We are having the thundershower. What are we having?
49. Carol kept working on the problem until she solved it.
50. We took our vacation so long ago, I can't remember much about it.
option: Our vacation lasted for a long time.
It has been a long time since our vacation.
It will be a long time until our vacation.
Our vacation will last for a long time.

topic.question: 51. The attack was repelled.
52. The temperature was around 70 degrees and it was a foggy morning.
option: There was some dust in the air.
The air had a low moisture content.
There was a steady breeze blowing.

topic.question: 53. The student has gone back to his country for good.
option: He has left for the time being.

topic.question: 54. John wants a berth on the train. What did he want?
55. Why did the welder use goggles?
56. When we flew over the ocean, there were clouds below us.
option: We could have seen the water if we had been above the clouds.
The clouds were all above our plane.
We saw the clouds but not the water.
We could not fly above the clouds.

topic.question:
57. W: Did you finish your assignment last night?
M: No, I didn't. I had a party last night.
Q: Why didn't the student finish his assignment?
option: because he didn't have a party

topic.question:
58. M: Did John use the interstate highway?
W: Yes, he did.
Q: What was John doing?

59. W: Where have you been?
M: I went to see a game.
Q: What did the man see?

60. W: How are the patients?
M: They're doing very well, except for the man in room 12.
Q: Where did the conversation most likely take place?

61. M: What is the prime reason for coming here?
W: I don't know the prime reason.
Q: What is it the woman didn't know?

62. W: Does the bus 45 go to the train station?
M: No, but I can give you a transfer.
W: Alright, I'll take it.
Q: What will the woman do?
option: She'll ride the bus that goes directly to the station.
The woman doesn't want to change buses.
The woman will remain on bus No. 45.
The woman will change to another bus.

topic.question:
63. W: What's the matter?
M: I'm in a rush.
Q: What do we know about the man?
option: He wants to go to bed.
He wants to get cleaned up.
He wants to drink something cold.
He wants to get somewhere fast.

topic.question:
64. W: How did you find out about the news?
M: It was broadcast.
Q: How did the man find out about the news?
option: He listened to it on the radio.
He learned about it from a friend.
He read about it in a newspaper.
His brother told him about it.

topic.question:
65. W: He collects rocks from all parts of the world.
M: That's nice. But do they have any value?
Q: What does the man want to know?

66. M: What happened to your coat?
W: It wore out.
Q: What did the woman mean?
